welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bexley, USA! Get ready to experience the charming small town feel and explore the beautiful parks, local restaurants, and unique shops this city is known for. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Bexley.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is dedicated to international flights and is used by airlines such as Air Canada and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'CMH Free WiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport handles a significant amount of freight and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Ohio State University Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminals.
